msubsection.title: wcversion
msubsection.p: Retrieves a state of the working copy. Similar to the svn's utility svnversion, just providing more. Crawls the working copy and retrieves the maximum revision number, revision range if workingCopy is mixed etc.

attribute.name: path
attribute.doc: a path to the working copy

attribute.name: prefix
attribute.doc: a string which will be prefixed to output properties set/filled by this command

attribute.name: processUnversioned
attribute.doc: flag whether presence of unversioned resoures should be treated as changes

msubsection.p: The command fill set the following properties: (with optional prefix applied)

tr.td: URL of the repository of the working copy root
the highest revision number in the working copy
the highest revision number in the working copy plus flags (M - modified, X - mixed)
the revision range (in mixed wc), similar to svnversion format. (e.g. 1000:1010MX)
the highest 'last committed revision' plus flags (M, X)
set to "true" if working copy is modified, property not set otherwise
set to "true" if working copy is mixed, property not set otherwise
